data.news_body: This is with reference to the e-mail received regarding disclosure filed under Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR on 26th August 2024. We would like to inform that the order was received on Friday 23th August 2024 post office hours. data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Board Meeting Outcome For Board Meeting Outcome
data.news_body:
1. The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 3rd February 2023, (commenced at 2.30 p.m. and concluded at 4.30 p.m.) has approved and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2022.

2. Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2022 prepared in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 together with Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors are enclosed herewith. The results are uploaded on the Company's website at www.suntv.in and on the websites of Stock Exchanges at www.bseindia.com and www.nseindia.com.

3. Earnings Release of our Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2022 is enclosed herewith.

4. An Interim Dividend of Rs.3.75/- per equity share of Rs.5/- each (i.e. 75%) for the financial year 2022-23 has been declared.

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For 31St March 2022
data.news_body:
1. The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 27th May 2022, (commenced at 2.30 p.m. and concluded at 4.50 p.m.) has approved and taken on record the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2022.

2. Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with Auditors' Report of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2022 prepared in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 are enclosed herewith.

3. Earnings Release of our Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2022 is enclosed herewith.

4. Pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations 2015, we hereby declare and confirm that the Reports of the Auditors as the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements for the year ended 31st March 2022 do not contain any modified opinion.

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 31St December 2021
data.news_body:
1. The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 10th February 2022, (commenced at 2.30 p.m. and concluded at 4.25 p.m.) has approved and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2021.

2. Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2021 prepared in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 together with Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors are enclosed herewith. The results are uploaded on the Company's website at www.suntv.in and on the websites of Stock Exchanges at www.bseindia.com and www.nseindia.com.

3. Earnings Release of our Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2021 is enclosed herewith.

4. An Interim Dividend of Rs.2.50/- per equity share of Rs.5/- each (i.e. 50%) for the financial year 2021-22 has been declared.

4. An Interim Dividend of Rs.2.50/- per equity share of Rs.5/- each (i.e. 50%) for the financial year 2021-22 has been declared.

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th September 2021
data.news_body:
With reference to the above, we hereby submit/inform that:

2. Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 30th September 2021 prepared in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 together with Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors are enclosed herewith. The results are uploaded on the Company's website at www.suntv.in and on the websites of Stock Exchanges at www.bseindia.com and www.nseindia.com.

3. Earnings Release of our Company for the quarter ended 30th September 2021 is enclosed herewith.

4. An Interim Dividend of Rs.2.50/- per equity share of Rs.5/- each (i.e. 50%) for the financial year 2021-22 has been declared.

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30Th June 2021
data.news_body:
With reference to the above, we hereby submit/inform that:

1. The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 13th August 2021, (commenced at 2.30 p.m. and concluded at 4.30 p.m.) has approved and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2021.

2. Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2021 prepared in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 together with Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors are enclosed herewith. The results are uploaded on the Company's website at www.suntv.in and on the websites of Stock Exchanges at www.bseindia.com and www.nseindia.com.

3. Earnings Release of our Company for the quarter and year ended 30th June 2021 is enclosed herewith.

4. An Interim Dividend of Rs.3.75/- per equity share of Rs.5/- each (i.e. 75%) for the financial year 2021-22 has been declared.

data.caption: Compliance Under Regulation 23(9) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed Disclosure of Related Party Transaction on a consolidated basis, in the format specified in the accounting standards for the Half Year ended 31st March 2021.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For March 31, 2021
data.news_body:
We hereby submit / inform that:

1. The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 11th June 2021, (commenced at 2.30 p.m. and concluded at 4.30 p.m.) has approved and taken on record the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2021.

2. Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with Auditors' Report of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2021 prepared in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 are enclosed herewith.

3. Earnings Release of our Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2021 is enclosed herewith.

4. Pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations 2015, we hereby declare and confirm that the Reports of the Auditors as the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements for the year ended 31st March 2021 do not contain any modified opinion.
